display_name: Anemia (e.g., iron deficiency, vitamin B12 deficiency, etc.)
Blood cancer (e.g., lymphoma, leukemia, myeloma, etc.)
Coagulation, purpura, or other hemorrhagic condition (e.g., Factor V Leiden, hemophilia, Von Willebrand disease, antiphospholipid syndrome, protein S or C deficiency, etc.)
